com.samczsun.skype4j.formatting

Class RichText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samczsun.skype4j.formatting.Text
      • com.samczsun.skype4j.formatting.RichText

  • public class RichText
extends Text
    Represents a rich text component. This component can be formatted. All children will also have the specified formats.
